thread.title: Britney Spears is over the moon after Christmas reunion with son Jayden: "Best Christmas of my life!!!"
thread.title_full: Britney Spears is over the moon after Christmas reunion with son Jayden: "Best Christmas of my life!!!"

author: Laura Miemczyk
title: Britney Spears is over the moon after Christmas reunion with son Jayden: "Best Christmas of my life!!!"
text:
Britney Spears is over the moon after Christmas reunion with son Jayden: "Best Christmas of my life!!!"
Los Angeles, California - This Christmas was a very special one for pop icon [Britney Spears](https://www.tag24.com/entertainment/celebrities/britney-spears) as she was able to embrace her younger son [Jayden James Federline](https://www.tag24.com/entertainment/celebrities/britney-spears/britney-spears-thrilled-to-reunite-with-son-jayden-after-years-apart-3334280) for the first time in a long time.
The Baby One More Time performer revealed this on Instagram on Wednesday evening – Christmas Day – by surprising her more than 42 million fans with a new [reel](https://www.instagram.com/reel/DEBpnA7N_9h/) in which she showed herself alongside the 18-year-old.
Among other things, the footage shows the mother and son duo standing outside a restaurant as Britney gives her offspring a loving kiss on the forehead.
The 18-year-old closes his eyes and seems to be enjoying the time with his famous mom just as much as the 43-year-old.
In another scene, Britney and Jayden have made themselves comfortable in front of a Christmas tree, while the two smile into the camera and wish their fans a very merry Christmas!
"Best Christmas of my life!!!" the mother-of-two wrote in the caption of the clip, revealing that she hadn't seen Jayden and his older brother [Sean Preston](https://www.tag24.com/entertainment/celebrities/britney-spears/inside-britney-spears-happier-next-chapter-after-a-tumultuous-year-3344471) (19) for two years.
Britney revealed that she shed "tears of joy" at the [reunion](https://www.tag24.com/entertainment/celebrities/britney-spears/more-tea-has-been-spilled-over-britney-spears-reunion-with-her-son-jayden-3335840) with her kiddo, adding, "I'm speechless thank you Jesus !!!"
Britney has recently been working hard to [strengthen her bond](https://www.tag24.com/entertainment/celebrities/britney-spears-son-allegedly-wants-to-mend-their-relationship-but-is-he-just-after-her-money-3334491) with her boys, who previously lived with their father Kevin Federline (46) in Hawaii.
According to the latest updates, she definitely seems to be on the right track.
Cover photo: Collage: Screenshots/Instagram/@britneyspears
